message: The morning passes uneventfully. After breaking for lunch, I start my afternoon shift.
Mr. Haga's out, leaving me alone in the shop.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yes... Yes. Well, we look forward to hearing from you again."
I take a breather after getting off the phone with a customer.
The usual voice trick worked on this guy, so I managed to sell him all sorts of crap.
It was a little annoying, though. He'd called before, and really hadn't wanted to hang up.
I'm still shaking off my disgust when the doorbell rings.
I stop leaning on the counter and stand up straight.
I let out an exaggerated sigh and go back to leaning on the counter.
Nothing good ever comes from them showing up.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I don't need trouble. Get outta here."

name: ミオ
message: "You just shut your stupid mouth, okay?"
They immediately find Junker and start chasing him around.

Junker flees as fast as he can.

He's clever for an Allmate and surprisingly agile too, so he's not exactly easy to catch, but that only makes the brats more determined.
Hold on, that shelf is wobbling...
And that cardboard box sure looks like it's about to fall...
I probably should get up and stop it...
...But the thought is a moment too late.
I grab the three of them by their collars and toss them out of the shop.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Oh just shut up already! Or I'll show you how mean a grown-up can get!"
I put my hands on my hips, doing my best impression of an intimidating teacher.

name: 蒼葉
message: "All you do is horse around! Why don't you think about what you've done? And get your butts home."

name: キオ
message: "Ugh, you're so annoying! Shut up, stupid!"
